answers.answer: Your fasting results are normal so you don't have diabetes. Blood sugar does flucuate through out the day. Is 81 the number you got after eating? How long after eating did you get this result? Take care. Remar

question: I have BP AND went for sugar test. the results are fasting-94 and post prandial just 81.it looks indifferntly what to do?
title: Sugar-post prandial is less than Fasting ?
